        public void halt()
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: SystemService
        Halt the Karaf container.

      • halt

        public void halt(java.lang.String time)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: SystemService
        Halt the Karaf container.
        Specified by:
        halt in interface SystemService
        Parameters:
        time - Shutdown delay. The time argument can have different formats. First, it can be an absolute time in the format hh:mm, in which hh is the hour (1 or 2 digits) and mm is the minute of the hour (in two digits). Second, it can be in the format +m, in which m is the number of minutes to wait. The word now is an alias for +0.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the halt fails.

      • reboot

        public void reboot()
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: SystemService
        Reboot the Karaf container.
        Specified by:
        reboot in interface SystemService
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the reboot fails.

      • reboot

        public void reboot(java.lang.String time,
                   SystemService.Swipe cleanup)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: SystemService
        Reboot the Karaf container.
        Specified by:
        reboot in interface SystemService
        Parameters:
        time - The reboot delay. The time argument can have different formats. First, it can be an absolute time in the format hh:mm, in which hh is the hour (1 or 2 digits) and mm is the minute of the hour (in two digits). Second, it can be in the format +m, in which m is the number of minutes to wait. The word now is an alias for +0.
        cleanup - Force a clean restart by deleting the working directory.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the reboot fails.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        value - The system property value.
